question.en-US: What object is directly in front of me?
question.zh-CN: 我的正前方是什么物体？
question.zh-HK: 乜嘢物體就喺我面前？

question.en-US: Can you identify the item on my left side?
question.zh-CN: 你能否识别我左边是什么物体？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以認出我左邊嘅物品啊？

question.en-US: Can you identify the item on my right side?
question.zh-CN: 你能否识别我右边是什么物体？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以認出我右邊嘅物品啊？

question.en-US: What item is the closest to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的物体是什么？
question.zh-HK: 乜嘢物品離我最近？

question.en-US: What is the object closest to the center of the frame?
question.zh-CN: 离画面中心最近的物体是什么？
question.zh-HK: 離畫面中心最近嘅物體係乜嘢？
